My about me site

Questions (page 1)

This part of assignment 2 demostrates the task “Content Modeling - Structure content types and fields within the Headless CMS to fit the needs of the SSG”

The way it can satisfy the needs of SSG was by making a slug to make the URLS, titles for headings, categories so it can be filtered which also helps another task, tags so it can be searched which helps another task again, and it can show the full content
